@ Galactigus

You do a dis-service to everyone when you post misinformation.

I just finished Season 2. Ep 20 and 22 are glitched at the end. 

Quality is very good but there are still glitched episodes. It would help everyone including Riddler if you identified these episode if you actually have watched them.

I am reporting glitches where I find them, but if I missed any I would like others to report them. I am caught up now on episodes I have missed so now I am skimming and might miss the glitches.

In season 3, the only glitch I noticed was Ep 1. It glitches out around 26:50 for a bit, then they sound cuts off at the end. 

I didn't catch any other major glitches in Season 3.
